alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 23 at 3:55PM EST until January 24 at 10:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern Middlesex and Northern New London Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact both the evening and morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Coverage of freezing rain could very well be more patchy and limited to higher elevations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
